bullets.text: Fed finalizes revised supervisory rating framework for large bank holding companies, tightening assessment of governance, capital planning, and liquidity risk.
Supreme Court justices skeptical of Trump-era tariffs, signaling potential limits on presidential trade powers that could reduce future import costs and inflation.
Retailers raising prices to pass tariffs; Amazon hiking more than rivals, adding near-term inflation pressure for consumers.
FAA cutting flight capacity 10% at 40 major airports amid shutdown; controller union warns recovery will take weeks, pressuring airlines and travel.
Elections suggest Trump’s advantage on the economy is slipping; GOP blames shutdown for losses, signaling voter sensitivity to economic disruptions.
Australia’s solar boom will deliver free electricity periods to millions in 2026, highlighting grid impacts of high renewable penetration.
Novo Nordisk trims weight-loss drug growth outlook amid pricing pressures, tempering GLP-1 demand expectations and sector valuations.
Qualcomm beats on earnings and revenue with strong forecast, but a sizable tax charge dents profit; AI handset and PC demand remains a tailwind.
Arm posts another billion-dollar quarter and ramps AI investments, underscoring sustained demand for compute IP across data center and edge.
Snap jumps on strong outlook and $400 million Perplexity partnership, highlighting crossover between AI search and ad-driven social platforms.
Ripple raises $500 million at $40 billion valuation, signaling renewed investor confidence in crypto-enabled payments and fintech infrastructure.
Google cleared to acquire Wiz for $32B, strengthening cloud security stack ahead of anticipated AI platform competition.
Norway reviews cybersecurity after hidden remote-access discovered in Chinese-made buses, spotlighting critical-infrastructure supply-chain risks.
Six-million-year-old Antarctic ice sample revises Earth’s climate history, improving constraints on past temperatures and atmospheric CO2.
New catalyst converts CO2 to fuel faster and cheaper, advancing carbon utilization pathways that could aid decarbonization.
